Package ca.nl.cna.sheham.assignments.Assignment5

Class InvoiceItem

java.lang.Object
ca.nl.cna.sheham.assignments.Assignment5.InvoiceItem
public class InvoiceItem extends Object
A class for an invoice item. Contains a product with its quantity.
